data_elements.name: id
data_elements.definition: A unique identifier for the tweet

data_elements.name: entities
data_elements.definition: Object containing information about hashtags, symbols, user mentions, and URLs mentioned in the tweet

data_elements.name: source
data_elements.definition: The source of the tweet (e.g. Twitter for iPhone)

data_elements.name: in_reply_to_status_id
data_elements.definition: The id of the tweet that this tweet is in reply to, if any

data_elements.name: in_reply_to_user_id
data_elements.definition: The id of the user that this tweet is in reply to, if any

data_elements.name: user
data_elements.definition: Object containing information about the user who posted the tweet

data_elements.name: geo
data_elements.definition: Geolocation information for the tweet, if available

data_elements.name: place
data_elements.definition: Information about the place where the tweet was posted, if available

data_elements.name: contributors
data_elements.definition: List of contributors to the tweet, if available

data_elements.name: retweeted_status
data_elements.definition: Object containing information about the original tweet that was retweeted, if the current tweet is a retweet

data_elements.name: retweet_count
data_elements.definition: Number of times the tweet has been retweeted

data_elements.name: favorite_count
data_elements.definition: Number of times the tweet has been marked as a favorite
